title: Jalsah AI Core System Architecture
description: Designed and documented complete system architecture for AI-powered mental health appointment platform with JWT authentication, REST API endpoints, and database schema

title: Database Schema Implementation
description: Created new database tables: snks_diagnoses, snks_therapist_diagnoses, snks_ai_coupons, snks_rochtah_bookings, snks_ai_analytics, snks_ai_notifications with proper relationships and constraints

title: JWT Authentication System
description: Implemented secure JWT authentication using Firebase JWT library with 24-hour token expiration, Bearer token authentication, and CORS headers for cross-origin requests

title: REST API Endpoints Development
description: Built comprehensive REST API with endpoints for authentication, therapist listing, appointment booking, cart management, diagnosis management, and order creation

title: User Registration and Login System
description: Built complete user registration system with email verification, required fields validation, and token-based login for AI platform

title: Enhanced WordPress Admin Interface
description: Created complete Jalsah AI admin panel with therapist profile management, diagnosis management, session tracking, coupon system, analytics, ChatGPT integration, and WhatsApp templates

title: Therapist Profile Management System
description: Implemented comprehensive therapist profile system with AI-specific settings, diagnosis assignments, commission percentages, and visibility controls

title: Diagnosis Management System
description: Built diagnosis CRUD operations with therapist assignments, ratings, suitability messages, and bulk operations support

title: AI Session Management
description: Implemented AI-specific session tracking with attendance management, 45-minute online-only sessions, and AI session badges

title: ChatGPT Integration Framework
description: Built ChatGPT API integration for diagnosis recommendations with customizable prompts, model selection, and temperature controls

title: Therapist Filtering & Sorting System
description: Implement filtering by rating (default), price, nearest appointment, search functionality, pagination (20 per page), and diagnosis-based filtering

title: Cart System Implementation
description: Built AI-specific cart system with real-time availability checking, multiple slots per therapist, and automatic cart clearing after checkout

title: WooCommerce Payment Integration
description: Enhanced WooCommerce integration with automatic product creation, order meta storage, payment processing, and webhook support for AI bookings

title: Frontend Cart System Integration
description: Enhanced existing Vue.js frontend cart system to work with WooCommerce order creation and payment processing

title: Main Dashboard UI Development
description: Build main page with two options: ChatGPT diagnosis or browse all therapists, implement navigation header with logo and menu

title: Booking Management Interface
description: Create patient bookings page with upcoming/past sessions, session cards with therapist info, action buttons for AI-specific bookings

title: Session Rescheduling System
description: Implement 24-hour free rescheduling, once per session limit, AJAX-based interface without page reload

title: Custom Session Page Development
description: Create AI-specific session interface, handle exit redirects (patients to bookings, doctors to settings)

title: Doctor Interface Enhancements
description: Add green AI session indicators, hide modification buttons, show AI diagnosis info, attendance confirmation system

title: File Sharing System
description: Enable doctors to send files to patients via email (25MB limit), store files in admin panel for management

title: Profit Distribution System Implementation
description: Implement custom profit percentages per doctor, separate rates for first session vs subsequent sessions with automated calculations

title: Coupon System Development
description: Implemented segment-based coupon system with usage limits, expiry dates, platform share-only discounts, and real-time validation

title: Analytics and Reporting System
description: Created comprehensive analytics tracking user drop-off points, booking patterns, retention metrics, and therapist performance leaderboards

title: WhatsApp Cloud API Integration
description: Implemented WhatsApp notification system with template management, variable substitution, and automated messaging for bookings and reminders

title: Email Notification System
description: Built customizable email notification system with template management, variable substitution, and toggle controls for different notification types

title: User Communication System
description: Enable bulk WhatsApp/email messaging for selected users, integration with analytics filters for targeted campaigns

title: Rochtah Prescription System
description: Created prescription workflow system with rochtah_doctor role, booking management, and prescription handling capabilities

title: Prescription Management Interface
description: Build prescription doctor dashboard for schedule management, patient queue, prescription creation with file upload

title: Admin Tools and User Management
description: Implemented admin tools including user switching functionality, user filtering by registration source, and quick action links

title: Therapist Ranking Display System
description: Create public page for therapists to view their AI ranking, visibility status, performance metrics

title: Therapist Application Management
description: Created unified therapist application and profile management system to eliminate data duplication and provide consistent workflows

title: Pricing and Filtering Logic Refactoring
description: Planned improvements to therapist filtering, diagnosis-based filtering, and location-based pricing logic for better user experience

title: Security Implementation
description: Implemented comprehensive security measures including input validation, sanitization, nonce verification, role-based access control, and rate limiting

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Comprehensive testing strategy including unit tests, integration tests, end-to-end tests, and manual QA for all AI platform features

title: Documentation and API Documentation
description: Complete technical documentation, API documentation, and user guides for the Jalsah AI platform integration

title: Performance Optimization
description: Optimize database queries, implement caching, ensure fast loading times, scalability testing

title: Production Deployment Preparation
description: Deployment checklist, migration scripts, and production environment setup for the complete AI platform

title: Finish the project
description: Hoooraaayyyyyy
